channel.title: Need Help: Creating a Client
channel.description:
Ok, its really simple, "How Do I Create My Very Own Custom Client?"
I would like to know how to either
A) Create one from scrach
or
B) Modify the original Moparscape Client to my liking
Could you show me how to change the wordings of it, font, backround, start up, welcome, music, ext.
(also could you give me links to other topics that answer my question? I havent seen one yet, also let me know if im in wrong fourm, im new...)
Thanks,
;D Hobo ;D

item.title: Need Help: Creating a Client
item.dc:creator: @Owner_A_Raffo Owner A Raffo
item.description:
@Owner_A_Raffo wrote:

Just Download A Client From The Download Section And Then Go Into Client.java and Egui.java and Any Other Files. And Press Ctrl + H To Search For The Name Of The Client And Things To Change It To Your Desire, But Theres A Forum Section Called; Private Client Hacking.

Please Post In The Correct Section Next Time

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help: Creating a Client
item.dc:creator: @God_of_Rock God of Rock
item.description:
@God_of_Rock wrote:

You can’t do it with MoparScape, it’s closed-source. Use an open-source client and learn Java s you can do it yourslef.

Read full topic
